oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Diary. A5 size. DB's journey to Kakia, Bechuanaland. Lots of blank pages. Not paginated by DB but has been paginated by library [1]-[165]. Features comments on journey, settlements, weather, rivers etc, peoples spotted (Masarwa, Bakalaharies etc), the odd little sketch, dictionary work done, photos taken, trading (buying & selling), people measured, artefacts purchased. Report on Lake Chrissie Bushmen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Dorothea Bleek - Book BC151_A3_006
